website_summaries.verdict: One skimboard designed for kids and adults. Good for growing children interested in the sport.
pros: Comes in several different size and color options
Foam traction pad provides a stable foundation while riding
cons: Sides and tip of the board can easily chip on hard objects

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money....broke in first 1/2 hour
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. Board split in 1/2 first 15 minutes on the water. Kids are beyond disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bytownmom

customer_reviews.title: once your kid is about 7ish i feel like the size for weight goes out the window
customer_reviews.text: This board was built as it stated on the site...the only complaint that I have with it is that the size of the board for the size of the kid....once your kid is about 7ish i feel like the size for weight goes out the window...I should have bought the larger size for my 10 year old nephew...just about everytime he threw it the wind would catch it and flip it, the larger boards that the other kids were using didn’t do it as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: A great skim board
customer_reviews.text: This is a top of the line board- Love it- shipped quick- awesome color. the shape is perfect- love the foam traction.
customer_reviews.author: The Tweeddale's

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Wood is delaminating and foam is detaching from wood. One week in use by an 8 year old. Avoid or at least be prepared to marine varnish if you buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a board that's all wood
customer_reviews.text: The top padding is okay for grip. My son wore the fiberglass off the bottom of the board in one day. And personally I would use a wood top board and put wax on it. You got better traction with wax on top of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Treder

customer_reviews.title: Great board, wide skimmer and wave hopper
customer_reviews.text: Well made and holding up nicely to a lot of novice abuse. IXPE Foam(what ever the hell that is) is great. Traction is awesome and NO separation from wood! Nice and wide for a lot of long skims and hopping those close in breakers. Easy to turn and spin.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Pass this up
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t slide well and on the first outing the foam grip stuff was gauged...
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great skim board; no wax necessary!
customer_reviews.text: We went to a gulf-side Florida beach, and this was an excellent skim board for my 3 sons, ages 14, 16, and 22. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: CR Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this skimboard. My only complaint is that the bottom was already scratched up when we unwrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Newton

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Kids really enjoyed during our vacation. Durable, sturdy and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: fernando gambirazio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, food packaging, works great for adult and kid, only issue a bit of the foam is coming apart from the wood with only 3 weekends used
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is not smooth. It has small chips in it. We used it for 2 days and I noticed it today when I was carrying it to the beach. To be honest I didn’t check the bottom when we purchased but regardless, one child used it for 2 days. This should not be happening. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Seems to be very durable. It’s just very heavy
customer_reviews.author: vitor

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: it wasn't what were used to in hawaii cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Danna Dambacher

customer_reviews.title: Adult skimboard
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on great condition. Can’t wait to try it out
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The board was a Christmas gift and just started being used.
customer_reviews.text: The board has warped and the foam is peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Good shape
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape not like it looks but is better shape then I thoat I was getin
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the first few months. board is now bowed and foam is detaching from the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loves his new board. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal chasse

customer_reviews.title: Came broke
customer_reviews.text: Came with wood chipped off the side and tip which was disappointing as it was a xmas present for our son and he noticed right when he opened it, we returned it no problem and will order from a different company because the foam on top made it look kind of cheap and not attractive
customer_reviews.author: pattiannp

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After 2 hrs of use by my 12 year old son the board layers seperateed. I'm sending it back. You can buy the same wood layered board at the beach for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Delivered terribly
customer_reviews.text: It came just floating in a box with no stirofoam or anything or a tips and tricks guide, and the bottom of the board was scratched, but the color is nice the foam is comfortable and grippy
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Fun skimboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skimboard. I bought it for my 11 years old son as an upgrade to his old one and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my 11 year old nephew ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 11 year old nephew. He loves it but it’s winter now and he’ll have to wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Guide
customer_reviews.text: Just received the 3 skim boards for my grandchildren. None of them came with the tricks and tips guide. Therefore I feel that that the company misrepresented their product in the description. My grandchildren are young and because the boards were supposed to come with a guide I didn’t hesitate to buy them. The other boards I looked at had no such guide so I opted to buy these boards instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Badly warped.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this board as a christmas gift. We brought it to the beach in June and found it that the shape was distorted. The near convex board was unridable.
customer_reviews.author: CF

product_meta.title: Fedmax Wood Skimboard with IXPE Foam Traction, No Wax Needed | Choose Size | Skim Board for Kids/Adults.
feature_bullets: CONTOURED DESIGN - Fedmax's high quality skimboard is engineered perfectly to achieve the best possible glide on the beach. Each board is slightly curved at the nose which allows for longer session times and prevents the board from diving when going in deeper water.

IXPE FOAM TRACTION - IXPE is a higher quality foam than EVA. EVA foam has a cross check pattern which does not create a full seal at the edge of the board, which is why so many EVA foam boards detach after 1 season. IXPE foam has a crocodile pattern which makes a full seal at the edge of the board and will last many seasons.
HIGH QUALITY WOOD - Each skimboard is made using Poplar wood, a highly resilient and lightweight type of wood.

PERFECT FOR BEGINNERS - Anyone can use this board to learn or perfect their moves. Stable and maneuverable thanks to the crocodile foam textured grip and light weight poplar wood, you’ll be gliding around on a sandy beach with ease.
90 DAY GUARANTEE - Try this skimboard for 90 days - if you don't love it, you can return it.
